content: Hi! I gave a talk about Lean-auto at CAV, which contained many updates compared to the talk I gave at LeanTogether 2023. Is there any chance I can post it on the leanprover-community youtube channel?
Who owns the copyright for the recording? Do you have the recording?
Yes I have the recording. I haven't though about copyright though ...
I recorded it on my laptop and I'm willing to share with anyone
Send me a link/file and I'll put it on the channel,
